fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, prepare to descend from the sky.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you use your day ability, the following message will be broadcasted to all evil players: "The Skywatcher has seen enough. They strike tonight."
- The following night, you may deal an Unstoppable attack that ignores protective effects to one player.
- While you are able to shoot, you do not have defense and protective effects used against you fail. If you die, your attack fails.
- You may use your day ability two times. If you have 0 shots, you lose your Defense.
